author: National Geographic
description:
Paid content for @VisitCostaRicaVideos  Travel to Costa Rica during the green season with National Geographic Explorer, Dr. Christine Wilkinson, and National Geographic photographer, Ruben Salgado Escudero, to discover the meaning of pura vida. Experience the tastes of local products at Turrialba Market, learn about Indigenous cultures and communities, and visit one of the most biodiverse regions on the planet. What is pura vida to you? 

Read more here: https://on.natgeo.com/49ri5S4
